summary: The mod changes some lightning/shock spells to be continuous fire spells and changes the Master spell to be more usable.
descriptionHtml:
The mod changes Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Thunderbolt to be continuous fire spells, dealing damage per second, rather than single cast spells.

This mod also changes the Master level spell Lightning Storm to no longer have a 3 second cast time and allows it to be equipped in the left hand.
author: Albion
